des:
This skill targets the verified users of the RiverOS Smart Home operating system. It enables controlling your supported smart home devices that are registered on RiverOS using the Alexa App/Voice Assistant in a very user friendly and efficient manner.

You can control your home lighting, TVs and other smart devices and sensors, set alarms and open/close doors with one simple voice command. You can get notified by Alexa when someone is at your door or when a device is up and running. Also, you can configure your own routines to automate smart home processes, such as shutting down devices and arming your alarm when leaving or make a nice hot coffee when waking up.
